summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Center Department; creating a position of Program Coordinator II in the Seattle Center's 1983 budget; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1983 budget of the Department; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor; all in conjunction with the Seattle Center Improvement Project contemplated by Ordinance 106629 (1977 Seattle Center Capital Improvement/Bond Issue.
